title: 08x4: Statutory Exception for Representation of Candidates and Specified Political Entities by Former Senior and Very Senior Employees
summary: 18 U.S.C. § 207(j)(7) provides an exception to the one-year no-contact ban for former senior employees and the two-year no-contact ban for very senior employees. These categories of employees do not violate the statute if a communication or appearance is on behalf of a candidate or one of the specified political entities.
